profile.description: My name is Javier, although people who know me call me Javi. I started studying a Higher Degree in Computer Systems Administration in Networks
profile.cybersecurity: After working for a cybersecurity company, I switched to web development as a frontend developer at Ogilvy. within the company Ogilvy.
profile.react: During my work experience, I have been training myself in the JavaScript React library, being able to make my first personal projects.
profile.goal: My goal is to be able to offer a better user experience, giving better performance optimization and response time.

experience.first-job-task: Business landing page creation with WordPress and e-commerce management with WooCommerce.
experience.second-job-task: Security alert monitoring of heterogeneous systems with Grafana.

projects.title: Projects
projects.first-project-description: Consult and save recipes from different countries to consult them at any time!
projects.second-project-description: Find and select 10 matching numbers, the game will display a confetti when the user has won!
